drugs.name: Ginseng
drugs.description: Used to tonify Qi, nourish blood, and enhance immunity.
drugs.side_effects: May cause insomnia, high blood pressure

drugs.name: Astragalus
drugs.description: Tonifies Qi and lifts Yang, enhances immunity.

drugs.name: Angelica
drugs.description: Nourishes blood, activates blood circulation, regulates menstruation, relieves pain.
drugs.side_effects: May cause diarrhea or allergic reactions

drugs.name: Chuanxiong
drugs.description: Activates blood, moves Qi, dispels wind, relieves pain.

drugs.name: Atractylodes
drugs.description: Tonifies the spleen and Qi, dries dampness, promotes water metabolism.

drugs.name: Poria
drugs.description: Promotes urination, drains dampness, tonifies the spleen and calms the mind.

drugs.name: Licorice
drugs.description: Tonifies the spleen and Qi, clears heat, detoxifies.
drugs.side_effects: Long-term use may cause high blood pressure

drugs.name: Goji Berry
drugs.description: Nourishes the liver and kidney, improves vision.
drugs.side_effects: Excessive use may cause heat symptoms.

drugs.name: Polygonum Multiflorum
drugs.description: Tonifies the liver and kidney, benefits essence and blood.

drugs.name: Mugwort
drugs.description: Warms the meridians, stops bleeding, expels cold and relieves pain.

drugs.name: Mint
drugs.description: Dispels wind, releases heat, soothes the throat.

drugs.name: Chrysanthemum
drugs.description: Clears heat and detoxifies, enhances vision.

drugs.name: Achyranthes
drugs.description: Activates blood circulation, supplements the liver and kidney.

drugs.name: Pinellia
drugs.description: Dries dampness, resolves phlegm, stops nausea and vomiting.

drugs.name: Ophiopogon
drugs.description: Nourishes Yin, moistens the lungs, generates body fluids.

drugs.name: Anemarrhena
drugs.description: Clears heat and drains fire, nourishes Yin, moistens dryness.

drugs.name: Coptis
drugs.description: Clears heat and dries dampness, clears fire and detoxifies.

drugs.name: Dendrobium
drugs.description: Nourishes Yin, clears heat, generates body fluids.

drugs.name: Schisandra
drugs.description: Astringes, nourishes Qi, generates body fluids.

drugs.name: Antler
drugs.description: Tonifies kidney Yang, strengthens blood and essence.

drugs.name: Cordyceps
drugs.description: Tonifies the lungs and kidneys, stops bleeding, resolves phlegm.

drugs.name: Seahorse
drugs.description: Tonifies kidney Yang, activates Qi, promotes blood circulation.
